entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Linq MaxBy and MinBy call eagerly the keySelector function. #61556
  • System.Text.Json deserialization bug #61550
  • Windows ARM64 CoreCLR runtime tests are failing in CI with empty logs #61548
  • Logging Source Generator fails with partial methods with implicit ILogger definition when using partial classes #61547
  • ReadyToRun composite build does not work on Windows 7 SP1 - no crash, just 0xC0000602 #61544

Closed

  • masemarket #61551

PullRequests

Created

  • ConcurrentBag AddRange proposal implementation #61557
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Add with sign/zero extend #61549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms to System.Security.Cryptography #61543
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add [Fact] attributes to JIT regression tests #61540
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [mono] Add a 'inline_method' profiler event. #61454
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update how OSR and PGO interact #61453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mini] Allow MONO_VERBOSE_METHOD='*:*' #61520
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Treat pointer fields in structs as blittable regardless of what they point at #61538
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code #61533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1468438 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Create runtime staging clone to manually kick off full test runs #61443
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix poisoning for very large structs #61521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #61446
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • XArch: Trim the code block to match the actual code length #61523
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation #61532
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add [Fact] attributes on TypeGeneratorTests #61534
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Loop refactoring and commenting improvements #61496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes to methodical JIT tests #61536
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8602 (dereference of a possible null reference) when using method group, but not when using lambda #57753
  • Invalid parsing of interpolated strings with curly braces followed after interpolation with format specifier #57750
  • IDE0059 and code fix for use discard but instead (correctly) simplifies to type match #57748
  • IDE 0044 and IDE 1006 making private static field PascalCase #57747
  • Show dialog when an item can't be edited because of source control #57746
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported on System.Index or System.Range #57745

Closed

  • Gold bar with exception in VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl.EnsureEditableDocuments when renaming a type (with rename file) #45031
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57754
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust tests for Windows 11 changes #57678
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler errors point to the beginning a .razor file, not to the actual error #38368
  • Blazor Scaffolding Logout page has incorrect route #38367
  • Possible bug in Visual Studio Professional 2022 Preview (64-bit) Version 17.0.0 Preview 6.0? #38365
  • Install Icon not showing on published WebAssembly PWA .NET application #38364
  • Exception when using interpolation in a partial view #38363
  • Listing IdentityUserClaims returns an entry multiple times. #38361
  • Blazor Server - Windows Authentication Type is not built/initialized during project creation #38360
  • Error after update node_modules in template ASP.NET CORE with React.js #38359
  • Vsual Studio 2022 (17.0.0) . In blazor web assembly component Rename operation do not work #38358
  • PageTitle Not Working with .Net 6.0 Blazor wasm project migrated from .Net 5.0 #38356
  • Areas do not work in ASP.NET Core with Angular project #38354
  • Blazor Client-Server: Inconsistent Json serialization (camelCase ⟷ PascalCase) #38353
  • Perf improvement: json_actix #38352
  • Hot Reload Takes Nearly 45 Seconds to Update #38351
  • VS2022 Release Blazor calling my OnParametersSetAsync 4 times on the same control #38350
  • CSS isolation will not be closed. How can we really isolate? #38348

Closed

  • System.text.json JsonSerializerOptions defaultbuffersize #38343
  • EntityFrameworkCoreXmlRepository Seems Suboptimal? #37985
  • Net Core 6.0 ERR Error running script #38254
  • Why is aspnetcore looking for deps.json in production env? #38275
  • False Build Failure: Static web asset svg has invalid source type '' #38366
  • Startup regression: json #38323
  • Error when publishing Blazor Hosted Project with a custom web.config #38239
  • Unexpected Inequality of FieldIdentifiers #36465
    Discussions
  • VS2022 Release: Blazor component inheritance fails when defining base class in the partial class #38320
  • Blazor WASM dev server Add Custom header for Cross origin Isolation #38327
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext, plaintext #38170
  • Perf regression: plaintext_nodejs #38322
  • 500.30 error on .net 5.0.12 #38347

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #38362
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update spa-templates #38345
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Resolve Component Governance bugs #38310
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Antiforgery middleware #38314
    area-runtime
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

entry.content:
Issues

  • [Bug] Default project Maui shows an empty app on macOS #3381

Closed

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3373

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use EqualsExact in DefaultDateTimeOffsetValueComparer #26672
  • Why ITypeMappingSource::FindMapping(property) requires IProperty, but not IReadOnlyProperty? #26671
  • Change EF Core merge behaviour #26668
  • IMethodCallTranslatorPlugin is Scoped in ServiceCharacteristics but Singleton in document #26667
  • Cannot create default/global query filter with variable when using an EntityTypeConfiguration class. #26666
  • EF Core tools does not work in combination with Azure KeyVault #26665
  • Migrations bundle: connection string is null #26664
  • M1 macOS monterey: dotnet-ef fails with libhostfxr.dylib could not be found #26663
  • Cosmos: translate array projection #26662

Closed

  • File Lock Held on SQLiteConnection After Leaving Using #26669
  • Add test coverage for index recreation after altering computed columns #26656
  • [6.0][CosmosDB] System.ArgumentException: value must not be null, empty, or whitespace. #26627

PullRequests

Created

  • Make concurrent test use different connections #26670
  • Query: Avoid parethesis around binary operations when used with AND/OR #26661
  • Query: Introduce method for providing brackets around SqlExpression b… #26660

Merged

  • Add test coverage for index recreation #26657

Updated

  • [6.0.1] Match indexer properties correctly #26645
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
